name: Prodware
description: These rules must be respected by all the AL code written within the company.

rules.justification: The file xxx.al has an incorrect name. The valid name is yyy.al.
The name of variables and parameters must be suffixed with the type or object name.
The Tooltip property for xxx must be filled
Variable xxx must have a suffix from this list: Msg, Tok, Err, Qst, Lbl, Txt.
Variable xxx with placeholders should have a comment explaining their content.
